remarks: The X sequence is a Lucas (second-order integer recurrence) sequence. Part 3 of equation 2.11 of [JonesMatijasevic] p. 695.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Oct-2014.)
statement: rmxluc $p |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmX ( N + 1 ) ) = ( ( ( 2 x. A ) x. ( A rmX N ) ) - ( A rmX ( N - 1 ) ) ) ) $.
